name: @adobe/helix-rum-collector
description: Collect Real User Monitoring Data for Helix

scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.cross-platform-bundle: mkdir -p pkg;tar --version | grep bsdtar && tar  zcvf pkg/helix3.tar.gz -s ';^;helix3/;' bin fastly.toml package.json || tar  zcvf pkg/helix3.tar.gz --transform 's,^,helix3/,' --show-transformed-names  bin fastly.toml package.json
scripts.bundle: npm run asbuild:optimized && npm run cross-platform-bundle
scripts.monkeypatch: echo '' >> node_modules/@fastly/as-compute/assembly/index.ts && echo '// monkey patch' >> node_modules/@fastly/as-compute/assembly/index.ts && echo 'import { FastlyPendingUpstreamRequest } from "./fastly/fastly-upstream/fastly-pending-upstream-request";' >> node_modules/@fastly/as-compute/assembly/index.ts && echo 'export { FastlyPendingUpstreamRequest };' >> node_modules/@fastly/as-compute/assembly/index.ts
